title: O shiva param
sahitya:
O shiva param poruLE nIyE tuNai


anupallavi

  IshA aDiyAr manam pAsham aruttu bhavam enum kaDaliruttu karai shErkkum aNNalE


caraNam    tAvi uyarat-tUkkum kailai ashaiya anjum tAyum manam kuLira sAma gAnam purinda
 rAvaNanai vadaitta rAmanum paNindu nirmANam sheida pAvana rAmalingamE jaya
